National teams, games, goals and standings from Group 3 of the first round stage played in the 1950 FIFA World Cup, including details of points, games won and lost and goals scored and received.

1950 Soccer World Cup - Group 3, First Round

National teams, games, goals and standings from Group 3 of the first round stage played in the 1950 FIFA World Cup, including details of points, games won and lost and goals scored and received.

Group 3, National Teams


Italy
Paraguay
Sweden

Group 3, Standings

Standing National Team PTS GP W D L GS GA GD Qualified
1. Sweden 3 2 1 1 0 5 4 1 Yes
2. Italy 2 2 1 0 1 4 3 1 No
3. Paraguay 1 2 0 1 1 2 4 -2 No

Group 3, Games Played

Game Date Results
1. Jun 25, 1950 Sweden 3 - 2 Italy
    7' - Riccardo Carapellese
    Hans Jeppsson - 25'
    Sune Andersson - 34'
    Hans Jeppsson - 69'
    79' - Ermes Muccinelli
2. Jun 29, 1950 Sweden 2 - 2 Paraguay
    Stig Sundqvist - 17'
    Karl-Erik Palmer - 26'
    35' - Cesar Lopez Fretes
    74' - Atilio Lopez
3. Jul 02, 1950 Italy 2 - 0 Paraguay
    Riccardo Carapellese - 12'
    Egisto Pandolfini - 63'

Abbreviations:
PTS = Points / GP = Games played / W = Wins / D = Draws / L = Losses
GF = Goals For / GA = Goals against / GD = Goal Difference

Note: until the 1990 World Cup each win was worth 2 points, after that each win is worth 3 points.
